title: Best of the Program | Guest: Megan Fox | 7/18/22
description:
Mayor Muriel Bowser claimed migrants being bused to D.C. are being "tricked." Tesla asked Texans to avoid charging their cars during peak hours. Investigative journalist Megan Fox is back to give an update on the 10-year-old girl who needed an abortion and the media's reaction to the story.
